articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: OpenAI and Jony Ive may be struggling to figure out their AI device - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI and Jony Ive reportedly face significant technical challenges as they work to develop a screen-less, AI-powered device.
articles.content:
OpenAI and Jony Ive face significant technical challenges as they work to develop a screen-less, AI-powered device, according to the Financial Times.
Back in May, OpenAI acquired io, the device star… [+900 chars]

articles.title: Breakthrough Blood Test Detects Head and Neck Cancer up to 10 Years Before Symptoms - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Mass General Brigham’s HPV-DeepSeek test enables much earlier cancer detection through a blood sample, creating a new opportunity for screening HPV-related head and neck cancers. Human papillomavirus (HPV) is responsible for about 70% of head and neck cancers…
articles.content: A novel blood test, HPV-DeepSeek, shows it can reveal head and neck cancers linked to HPV up to 10 years before symptoms arise. The findings hint at a future where these cancers could be treated far … [+5099 chars]
